member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Credits for the Balfour's Business Class Library go to the following people:
Jamie Balfour - main development Michael Balfour - graphical development Predrag Gruevski - transparent listview Eduardo Oliveira - for the MDI tab control, which has been extended by Jamie Balfour Mav Northwind - for the hyperlink system that is built into the Cobra Richtextbox Jeroen Landheer - additional code for Yorkshire Hill web browser and how to achieve the FlyCatcher 3.0 side to it Microsoft - for .NET Framework, [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: M:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Controls.TransparentListView.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new TransparentListView object.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Controls.TransparentListView.ErrorTextColor
member.summary: The color to use when a certain ListViewItem has unresolved issues.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Controls.TransparentListView.HighlightColor
member.summary: The color to use when highlighting an item.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Controls.TransparentListView.RedrawInterval
member.summary: The intervals at which to redraw the control when scrolling. Higher values are reccomended for less powerful CPUs. Decrease this value if experiencing choppy redraws during scrolling. Values below 5-6ms may result in extreme CPU use.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Controls.TransparentListView.RedrawOnMouseMove
member.summary: True if the control should be redrawn when the mouse is moved, otherwise False.
member.remarks: There have been some issues with the Set method, so it's temporarily disabled and has no effect.

member.name: M:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.#ctor
member.summary: Wenn using this constructor the Image property must be set before accessing properties.

member.name: M:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates Info Class to read properties of an Image given from a file.
member.param: A string specifiing image file name on a file system.

member.name: M:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.#ctor(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Creates Info Class to read properties of a given Image object.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.Image
member.summary: Sets or returns the current Image object.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.PixXDim
member.summary: Type is PropertyTagTypeShort or PropertyTagTypeLong Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid width of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag, whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.PixYDim
member.summary: Type is PropertyTagTypeShort or PropertyTagTypeLong Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid height of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file. Because data padding is unnecessary in the vertical direction, the number of lines recorded in this valid image height tag will be the same as that recorded in the SOF.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.XResolution
member.summary: Number of pixels per unit in the image width (x) direction. The unit is specified by PropertyTagResolutionUnit

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.YResolution
member.summary: Number of pixels per unit in the image height (y) direction. The unit is specified by PropertyTagResolutionUnit.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.ResolutionUnit
member.summary: Unit of measure for the horizontal resolution and the vertical resolution. 2 - inch 3 - centimeter

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.Brightness
member.summary: Brightness value. The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of -99.99 to 99.99.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.EquipMake
member.summary: The manufacturer of the equipment used to record the image.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.EquipModel
member.summary: The model name or model number of the equipment used to record the image.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.Copyright
member.summary: Copyright information.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.DateTime
member.summary: Date and time the image was created.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.DTOrig
member.summary: Date and time when the original image data was generated. For a DSC, the date and time when the picture was taken.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.DTDigitized
member.summary: Date and time when the image was stored as digital data. If, for example, an image was captured by DSC and at the same time the file was recorded, then DateTimeOriginal and DateTimeDigitized will have the same contents.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.ISOSpeed
member.summary: ISO speed and ISO latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.Orientation
member.summary: Image orientation viewed in terms of rows and columns.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.FocalLength
member.summary: Actual focal length, in millimeters, of the lens. Conversion is not made to the focal length of a 35 millimeter film camera.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.FNumber
member.summary: F number.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.ExposureProg
member.summary: Class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.MeteringMode
member.summary: Metering mode.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info.PropertyItems
member.summary: Returns a Hashtable of all available Properties of a gieven Image. Keys of this Hashtable are Display names of the Property Tags and values are transformed (typed) data.

member.name: T:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.Info
member.summary: This Class retrives Image Properties using Image.GetPropertyItem() method and gives access to some of them trough its public properties. Or to all of them trough its public property PropertyItems.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTag.Type
member.summary: Specifies the data type of the values stored in the value of that PropertyItem object. Note that this are not ordinary .NET types.

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTag.Id
member.summary: Id of a Property Tag

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTag.TagName
member.summary: Display Name of a Property Tag

member.name: P:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTag.Value
member.summary: Transformed value of the PropertyItem.Value byte array.

member.name: M:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTag.getValue(System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem)
member.summary: Transformes value of the PropertyItem.Value byte array to apropriate .NET Framework type.

member.name: M:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTag.getNameFromId(BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagId)
member.summary: Returns the Display Name of a Property Item. The current imlementation will return a name of the Enumeration member.

member.summary: Specifies that the format is 4 bits per pixel, indexed.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.Byte
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of bytes.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.ASCII
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is a null-terminated ASCII string. If you set the type data member of a PropertyItem object to PropertyTagTypeASCII, you should set the length data member to the length of the string including the NULL terminator. For example, the string HELLO would have a length of 6.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.Short
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of unsigned short (16-bit) integers.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.Long
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of unsigned long (32-bit) integers.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.Rational
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of pairs of unsigned long integers. Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.Undefined
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of bytes that can hold values of any data type.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.SLONG
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of signed long (32-bit) integers.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType.SRational
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of pairs of signed long integers. Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.

member.name: T:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagType
member.summary: Specifies the data type of the values stored in the value data member of that same PropertyItem object.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagId.Artist
member.summary: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the person who created the image.

member.name: F:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagId.BitsPerSample
member.summary: Number of bits per color component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

member.name: T:BalfoursBusinessClassLibrary.Classes.PropertyTagId
member.summary: The following Enumeration gives list (and descriptions) of the property items supported in EXIF format.
